title: [Feat]: Flatpak: Update runtime
body:
### Describe the feature

Update the flatpak runtime to `org.freedesktop.Platform/x86_64/24.08`

### Motivation

When looking into my installed flatpacks, I see that TfL v1.12.7 is using, as only one,  the runtime:
`org.freedesktop.Platform/x86_64/23.08` while all others have `org.freedesktop.Platform/x86_64/24.08`

For resource optimisation, I ask if the runtime could be upgraded.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
